name: Crime Scene Investigation
description:
Got bored of usual escape games?
We came up with an alluring escape game!
Juliet works in a reputed company.
She always have doubted about the behavior of specific members in the concern.
One fine day, she traced the scam of those four employees.
She decided to intimate this to higher officials with evidences.
But by knowing this, they killed Juliet brutally. Give justice to her death by solving the case.
Investigate and find the evidences to corner the murderers.
Your task is to collect all the items found in the screen and correlate them logically or illogically to escape the angels.
The rules to collect the items are simple saviors Just tap on the item it will be added to the inventory panel.
Have a great escape!
FEATURES:
? Creative concept
? Easy Puzzles
? Attractive Background
? Turn on/off sound
? Supports both Phone/Tab
? No limited timing
? Video Walk Through available
? Be careful, it is very addictive!!
If you like this Game, don’t forget to rate us!!
Also Leave your Comments, this will motivate us…
Last but not the Least, share this Game with your friends!
Tags: CSI,Crime investigation, solve the murder, criminal case, puzzle, escape game, hidden objects
